text: Nænxn di khadthun pi læw brrda phu thi ptiseth tx ka rph bxallxhˌ cnkrathang meux wan ki ya mah di mayang phwk khea doy kathanhan læw phwk khea k klaw wa xo khwam seiycı khxng rea nı sing thi rea di thahı bkphrxng nı lok doythi phwk khea bæk brrda bap khxng phwk khea wi bn hlang khxng phwk khea dwy phung ru theid wa chang lew ray cring«sing thi phwk khea kalang bæk xyu
